summary: The Department of Defense expects that its health care beneficiaries will be able to access specialty care within 3 days after an urgent referral. Our analysis of 16,754 urgent referrals at military treatment facilities found: More than half met the 3-day expectation About 9% waited 3 weeks or longer According to DOD, some longer waits were due to patient preference or pending lab results. In...
title: Defense Health Care: Efforts to Ensure Beneficiaries Access Specialty Care and Receive Timely and Effective Care
